welcome_message_body: Welcome to Middletown, where small-town charm meets rich history and natural beauty. Enjoy exploring our historic downtown, scenic parks, and local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that this charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal via a skywalk.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and is connected to the main terminal via a skywalk.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and charter flights, the private terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport provides a more personalized and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
